files.name: main.py
files.content:
import random
randomOne = random.randint (1, 20)
randomTwo = random.randint (5, 10)

print ("I am thinking of anumber between 1 and 20")
print ("You have", randomTwo, "guesses.")


Secret = randomOne
Guesses = randomTwo
counter = 1
print(" ")

while( counter <= Guesses ):
  prompt  = "Guess #" + str(counter) + "? "
  theGuess = int( input( prompt ) )
  if ( theGuess == Secret):
    print ("Yes!")
    break
  elif (theGuess > Secret):
    print (theGuess, "is too high")
    counter = counter + 1
  elif (theGuess < Secret):
    print (theGuess, "is too low")
    counter = counter + 1
  else:
    print ("No, my number is not", theGuess)
    counter = counter + 1

print ("The secret number was", Secret)
